languages.text: "Ну, в следующий раз не попадешься так глупо. Ах да, ведь следующего раза не будет!" {n}Комиссар даже не пытается скрыть кривляющиеся глумливые нотки в голосе.{/n}
"It's all right, you won't be so gullible next time. Oh wait — there won't be a next time!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ну, в следующий раз не попадешься так глупо. Ах да, ведь следующего раза не будет!" {n}Комиссар даже не пытается скрыть кривляющиеся глумливые нотки в голосе.{/n}

traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: « C'est pas grave, vous serez moins {mf|naïf|naïve} la prochaine fois. Oh, mais c'est vrai ! Il n'y aura pas de prochaine fois... » {n}Le commissaire n'essaie même pas de dissimuler son sarcasme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all right, you won't be so gullible next time. Oh wait — there won't be a next time!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est pas grave, vous serez moins {mf|naïf|naïve} la prochaine fois. Oh, mais c'est vrai ! Il n'y aura pas de prochaine fois... » {n}Le commissaire n'essaie même pas de dissimuler son sarcasme.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: “不要介意，下次你就没这么容易上当受骗了。噢，等等——不会再有下次了！”{n}政委丝毫没有掩饰声音中的讥讽之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all right, you won't be so gullible next time. Oh wait — there won't be a next time!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不要介意，下次你就没这么容易上当受骗了。噢，等等——不会再有下次了！”{n}政委丝毫没有掩饰声音中的讥讽之意。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: 「心配するな。次は騙されることもないだろう。待てよ…そうか、次はないのだったな！」{n}その声に混じる皮肉や嘲笑をコミッサーは隠そうともしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all right, you won't be so gullible next time. Oh wait — there won't be a next time!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「心配するな。次は騙されることもないだろう。待てよ…そうか、次はないのだったな！」{n}その声に混じる皮肉や嘲笑をコミッサーは隠そうともしない。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: "Schon gut, beim nächsten Mal seid Ihr nicht mehr so naiv. Aber Moment – es wird gar kein nächstes Mal mehr geben!" {n}Der Kommissar macht keine Anstalten, den sarkastischen Spott in seiner Stimme zu verhüllen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all right, you won't be so gullible next time. Oh wait — there won't be a next time!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Schon gut, beim nächsten Mal seid Ihr nicht mehr so naiv. Aber Moment – es wird gar kein nächstes Mal mehr geben!" {n}Der Kommissar macht keine Anstalten, den sarkastischen Spott in seiner Stimme zu verhüllen.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: «No pasa nada, la próxima vez no será tan {mf|crédulo|crédula}. ¡Ah, no, que no habrá una próxima vez!». {n}El comisario no hace ningún esfuerzo por disimular el tono sarcástico de su voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all right, you won't be so gullible next time. Oh wait — there won't be a next time!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No pasa nada, la próxima vez no será tan {mf|crédulo|crédula}. ¡Ah, no, que no habrá una próxima vez!». {n}El comisario no hace ningún esfuerzo por disimular el tono sarcástico de su voz.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: "Sorun değil, bir dahakine bu kadar gafil avlanmazsın... Bir saniye... Bir dahaki diye bir şey olmayacak!" {n}Komiser, sesindeki kinayeyi gizlemeye tenezzül dahi etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all right, you won't be so gullible next time. Oh wait — there won't be a next time!" {n}The Commissar makes no effort to conceal the sarcastic mockery in his voice.{/n}
